name: Real Outer Space
description:
SPACE....not as tightly packed with planets as this game may present

EXPLORE, COLLECT, RETURN, REPEAT

Most activities are done on your home planet.

Travel to different planets to collect resources and return to your home planet to sell and make upgrades

MOUSE CURSOR aims and RIGHT CLICK to boost. Repeatedly flying face first into planets will get you no where, land nicely on your landing gear.

most people just fly off in a random direction and have to ditch their ship.....don't do that

Made in 1-week for the VimJam game jam
